1470.title: Ek Hasina Thi
1470.description: Durga is out to avenge the crimes committed by Shaurya, a playboy and the scion of the powerful Goenka family of Kolkata.

15520.title: Kaal Bhairav Rahasya
15520.description: Heirs of Kanakgarh's Royal family don't survive beyond the age of 30. Will Veer and his lady love Archana free the family from the 150-year-old curse?

18112.title: Qayaamat Ki Raat
18112.description: An intriguining story of love and reincarnation. Gauri and Raj reunite after 28 years only to come across their fateful past. What's in store for them next?

18293.title: Nazar
18293.description: Apurva lives under the constant threat of his sister, Mohini, a Daayan. Unaware that he is a Daavansh himself, what will happen when he discovers his powers?

1000074189.title: Drishyam
1000074189.description: Story of a common family man who takes desperate measures to save his wife and two daughters when they unwittingly get entangled into a crime.

1260003582.title: Divya-Drishti
1260003582.description: Separated at childhood, Divya and Drishti attain super powers to see and manipulate future. But their own future lies in the hands of a Pisachini.

1260003957.title: Nojor
1260003957.description: The Singha Roys may look like a normal family, but they are reeling under the evil sight of a supernatural entity, a Daayni. And once fallen, it never leaves.

1260048191.title: Dombivli Return
1260048191.description: An honest man from a humble background stumbles upon a photograph that can either be an opportunity of a lifetime or be the end of him. What will he choose?

1260054967.title: The Tattoo Murders
1260054967.description: Police officer Aditi must catch a serial killer with just one clue, a scorpion tattoo on the victims. To stop the menace, she must dig into her own past.

1260062944.title: Crime Next Door
1260062944.description: Inspector Shekhawat investigates some of the most heinous and toughest murder cases of his entire career. Tough to crack, the truth is not always what it seems.

1260065173.title: Ankahi Ansuni
1260065173.description: Sub-inspector Umesh, an eccentric genius, accepts a doomed posting at a sleepy town infamous for mysterious sightings, age-old myths and unsolved crimes.

1260086570.title: Hate Story 2
1260086570.description: Hell hath no fury like a woman wronged! After witnessing her lover die, Sonika goes on a killing spree to avenge him.
1260086570.crisp: Violence, Some Scenes of Intimacy, Some Coarse Language

1260103747.title: Aashiqana
1260103747.description: NEW EPISODES FROM MON-SAT. A roaring rampage of revenge! Terror reigns the city as masked maniacs wreak carnage. Can Yash and Chikki put an end to this nightmare?

1260108807.title: Sisterhood
1260108807.description: Days before her wedding, Ipek learns the shocking truth that she has two sisters. However, soon after meeting, the sisters find themselves in an unexpected situation.

1260120683.title: Ana's Revenge
1260120683.description: Analía Guerrero executes an elaborate plan to unmask and destroy the presidential candidate Guillermo Mejía, who took her mother from her 30 years ago.

1260126094.title: Taaza Khabar
1260126094.description: A public toilet caretaker's poverty-stricken life takes a drastic U-turn when he helps an old woman. How long will fate smile upon him?

1260128382.title: The Night Manager
1260128382.description: A hotel's night manager is the only weapon against a dangerous arms dealer. Will he be able to stop him?

1260132120.title: Alone
1260132120.description: During the pandemic, Kalidasan gets stranded in his newly rented flat which turns out to be haunted. How will he cope with this eerie and mysterious lockdown?
1260132120.crisp: Some Coarse Language, Supernatural Content, Fantasy Violence

1260132747.title: Run Baby Run
1260132747.description: Sathya's simple life takes a drastic turn after he tries to help an unknown woman in trouble. How will he escape from this complicated situation?
1260132747.crisp: Mature Theme, Some Frightening Scenes, Some Mature Content
